trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainInformation"></xref> class contains information about a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object and is contained in a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainInfoCollection"></xref> object.
Gets the DNS name of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object.
A string that contains the DNS name of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object.
Gets the SID of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object.
A string that contains the SID of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object.
Gets the NetBIOS name of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object.
A string that contains the NetBIOS name of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the status of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object.

One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ForestTrustDomainStatus"></xref> values that represents the status of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain"></xref> object.
Status is not a valid enumeration value.
